web_snippets: Akeel Bilgrami (born 28 February 1950) is an Indian philosopher. He has been in the Department of Philosophy at Columbia University since 1985.

Prof. Akeel Bilgrami got a first degree in English Literature from Elphinstone College Bombay and then went as a Rhodes Scholar to Oxford University.
